title: Episode 482 - Special Guest Alex Jones
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with Info Wars host Alex Jones on the evening of "The Clappening" as we discuss what is really going on at Area 51, how one of his family members got killed by a human zombie, the moment he found o...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with Info Wars host Alex Jones on the evening of "The Clappening" as we discuss what is really going on at Area 51, how one of his family members got killed by a human zombie, the moment he found out he was banned from the internet, how he correctly called the entire Jeffery Epstein ordeal, why we should keep fighting back against China, and we go over the Top 10 conspiracy theories from the last 50 years and get his thoughts. Wild show.
